EmailTemplate.name: TORCHx Auto Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll Be In Touch Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting TorchX Support! We received your message and look forward to assisting you as soon as possible.
If you need immediate assistance, you are welcome to call us at (888) 428-9659 with your reference number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Weâ€™re here Monday through Friday, from 8am to 6pm CST.
Thank you for choosing TorchX, we appreciate your business!
